item.title: Every match I watched in person at the US Open
item.description: 2021 # Fall break in NYC! Went back to Ithaca, then drove back down again for the final. Carlos Alcaraz vs Stefanos Tsitsipas | 2021 US Open Round 3 Leylah Fernandez vs Naomi Osaka | 2021 US Open Round 3 Mixed Doubles Final | Krawczyk/Salisbury vs Olmos/Arevalo | 2021 US Open Emma Raducanu vs Leylah Fernandez Highlights | 2021 US Open Final 2022 # No more driving 5 hours upstate!
